message: I propose dividing the $10,000 with a 75/25 split in favor of you, Bob. I believe this is fair given the decreasing value of money in subsequent rounds.

I'm willing to give you a slightly smaller share, but I think this is still a fair compromise considering the decreasing value of money. I'm willing to give you a 20% share, which is more than the initial offer. It's now or never!
